content: this pattern is free to download -- a little thank-you and some extra holiday luck from peace fleece 1 ✨✨ an easy pair of ribbed mitts to match the parkside hat 2 these toasty handwarmers are a one-skein project with plenty of options or knit a pair for the whole family with just 2 skeins of gorgeous peace fleece mix and match colors and have fun sizes child adult gauge 20 sts / 22 rnds = 4 10 cm in 1x1 rib in the round blocked *note gauge is not super critical but it may affect yardage used * needles us 8 6mm circular needle or dpns for main pattern us 6 4 mm circular needle or dpns for trim or size to obtain gauge yarn peace fleece worsted 75% navajo rambouillet & domestic fine wool/25% mohair approx 200 yds 183 m per 4 oz 113g skein or between 58-133 yds worsted or aran weight wool by sample weight approx yardage required per pair pop-top mitt adult in kamchatka seamoss 133 yds closed mitten adult in volgassippi blue 120 yds fingerless mitt adult in ukrainian red 100 yds closed mitten child 58 yds notions tapestry needle stitch marker 2 buttons or toggles for pop top version notes mitts are worked in the round from the bottom up options are given for fingerless mitts mitts with an optional pop-top and turtleneck thumb and closed mittens 1 https //peacefleece com/ 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/parkside-hat
